step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are stretched overhead and fingers are open.
You're doing well with the arm stretch overhead. Keep your fingers open as you exhale and relax.
Great effort making a fist and pushing down! Remember to squeeze your shoulder blades together and inhale as you tighten your muscles.
Excellent job stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Continue to relax your muscles during this phase.
You're consistently performing the movements. Keep up the good work with the arm movements and breathing cues.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms overhead with open fingers, then make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades. Breathe in as you tighten, and exhale as you relax your arms back.
